text: NeNe Leakes is putting her Real Housewives of Atlanta co - stars on blast and possible notice if she has her way. The outspoken Real Housewives of Atlanta star stopped by for a chat with E! News and blasted her co - stars ; telling the outlet that if she had her way half the current cast would get the ax. “ Honey, I don ’ t have an executive seat at Bravo, but if I did, half of this cast would be gone, ” NeNe admitted. “ Trust me. I would not have them here working. ” Meanwhile, NeNe is also advocating for her BFF Marlo Hampton to get a peach and become a full - time cast member in the future.
